title: Stuttgarter Declaration: Gender. Self. Determined.
description: The Stuttgarter Declaration emphasizes the importance of respectful treatment of transgender and intersex people. It underlines the significance of human rights in medical, psychotherapeutic, consulting, and support services for transgender and intersex individuals. Developed by physicians, psychotherapists, human rights activists, and affected individuals, it emphasizes the right to determine one's own gender and the obligation for medical treatments to respect this self-determination.
